Method Detail

getDatasource

remote string getDatasource(string adminPassword, [string adminUsername=''], [string adminAPIPath=''], string dsn)
Returns specified datasource in common CFMLAdminAPI datasource structure (converted to XML)

Parameters:
adminPassword - administrator password
adminUsername - administrator username (ColdFusion 8+ only)
adminAPIPath - override default Admin API path (ColdFusion & Open BlueDragon only)
dsn - Name of the datasource to be retrieved

getDatasources

remote string getDatasources(string adminPassword, [string adminUsername=''], [string adminAPIPath=''])
Returns datasources in common CFMLAdminAPI datasource structure (converted to XML)

Parameters:
adminPassword - administrator password
adminUsername - administrator username (ColdFusion 8+ only)
adminAPIPath - override default Admin API path (ColdFusion & Open BlueDragon only)

toXML

private string toXML(any input, string element)
Convert structures/arrays (including embedded) to XML

Parameters:
input - data to convert into XML
element - name of the root element
